title: What Are They Going to Choose for the Top 25 Cigars? - The After Show
itunes:title: What Are They Going to Choose for the Top 25 Cigars? - The After Show
description:
The Cigar Authority has already published their list for contenders for Cigar of the Year. The Cigar Authority was the original to choose a cigar of the year. What will Cigar Afficionado, Cigar Journal and the consensus choose?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
